name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Bloodstained Ritual of the Night/BloodstainedRotN.exe

content:
files:
- gogsetup: N/A:Select the game's setup file
- mf_install_verb: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/winetricks/mf_install.verb
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Bloodstained Ritual of the Night/BloodstainedRotN.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: mf_install_verb
    name: winetricks
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing game
    executable: gogsetup
    name: wineexec
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: false
